# This file was automatically generated by the Stellaris PlanetarySystemUtility
#		Written by primem0ver (aka VaporFeces on Steam).

# NOTE: Planet (slot) counts are calculated with forced giants counting as 2 planets

# SPECIAL NOTE: 
#	The system naming convention used here has been altered from the vanilla naming convention 
#	because of the possibility of additional automatically generated systems.  Most vanilla 
#	systems are still present in this list.  Exceptions are those that come later due to
#	final_frontier's monster expansion system.

# Game will first pick an initializer using usage_odds, but only use it if it passes the spawn_chance check
# Even if it fails the spawn_chance check it will still count towards the initializer's max_instances

@base_moon_distance = 10

# Leviathans DLC System Initializers


#Artists I
guardian_artists_init_1 = {
	class = sc_m
	asteroids_distance = 55
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	spawn_chance = 100
	flags = { guardians_artists_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 7 max = 11 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = guardians_artists_planet
			create_species = {
				name = random
				class = random
				portrait = random
				traits = random
				homeworld = this
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:artist_enclave_country
					}
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Artisan_Troupe"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_democratic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_artist_collective
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_artist.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "vertical.dds"
						}
						colors = {
							"dark_purple"
							"purple"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_spiritualist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					save_global_event_target_as = artist_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = artist_enclave_country
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Ars_Artem"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Artist_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
				else = {
					event_target:artist_enclave_country = {
						create_fleet = {
							name = "NAME_Ars_Artem"
							settings = { spawn_debris = no }
							effect = {
								set_owner = prev
								create_ship = {
									name = random
									design = "NAME_Artist_Enclave_Station"
									graphical_culture = prev
									#effect = {
									#	save_event_target_as = station_location
									#}
								}
								set_location = {
									target = prevprev
									distance = 90
								}
								set_fleet_flag = artist_enclave_station
							}
						}
						create_leader = {
							type = ruler
							species = prev
							name = random
							skill = 2000
						}
						set_leader = last_created_leader
					}
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 15
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

}

#Artists II
guardian_artists_init_2 = {
	class = sc_m
	asteroids_distance = 55
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	scaled_spawn_chance = 16
	flags = { guardians_artists_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 7 max = 11 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = guardians_artists_planet
			create_species = {
				name = random
				class = random
				portrait = random
				traits = random
				homeworld = this
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:artist_enclave_country
					}
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Artisan_Troupe"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_democratic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_artist_collective
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_artist.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "vertical.dds"
						}
						colors = {
							"dark_purple"
							"purple"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_spiritualist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					save_global_event_target_as = artist_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = artist_enclave_country
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Ars_Artem"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Artist_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
				else = {
					event_target:artist_enclave_country = {
						create_fleet = {
							name = "NAME_Ars_Artem"
							settings = { spawn_debris = no }
							effect = {
								set_owner = prev
								create_ship = {
									name = random
									design = "NAME_Artist_Enclave_Station"
									graphical_culture = prev
									#effect = {
									#	save_event_target_as = station_location
									#}
								}
								set_location = {
									target = prevprev
									distance = 90
								}
								set_fleet_flag = artist_enclave_station
							}
						}
						create_leader = {
							type = ruler
							species = prev
							name = random
							skill = 2000
						}
						set_leader = last_created_leader
					}
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 15
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

}

#Artists III
guardian_artists_init_3 = {
	class = sc_m
	asteroids_distance = 55
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	scaled_spawn_chance = 12
	flags = { guardians_artists_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 7 max = 11 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			set_planet_flag = guardians_artists_planet
			create_species = {
				name = random
				class = random
				portrait = random
				traits = random
				homeworld = this
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:artist_enclave_country
					}
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Artisan_Troupe"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_democratic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_artist_collective
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_artist.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "vertical.dds"
						}
						colors = {
							"dark_purple"
							"purple"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_spiritualist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					save_global_event_target_as = artist_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = artist_enclave_country
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Ars_Artem"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Artist_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
				else = {
					event_target:artist_enclave_country = {
						create_fleet = {
							name = "NAME_Ars_Artem"
							settings = { spawn_debris = no }
							effect = {
								set_owner = prev
								create_ship = {
									name = random
									design = "NAME_Artist_Enclave_Station"
									graphical_culture = prev
									#effect = {
									#	save_event_target_as = station_location
									#}
								}
								set_location = {
									target = prevprev
									distance = 90
								}
								set_fleet_flag = artist_enclave_station
							}
						}
						create_leader = {
							type = ruler
							species = prev
							name = random
							skill = 2000
						}
						set_leader = last_created_leader
					}
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 15
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

}

#Curators I
guardian_curators_init_1 = {
	class = sc_g
	asteroids_distance = 53
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	scaled_spawn_chance = 12
	flags = { guardians_curators_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 30
		has_ring = no

		init_effect = {
			create_species = {
				name = random
				class = random
				portrait = random
				traits = random
				#homeworld = this
			}
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Curator_Alpha_Enclave"
				type = enclave
				authority = "auth_oligarchic"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_ancient_preservers
				}
				species = last_created
				flag = {
					icon = {
						category = "enclaves"
						file = "enclaves_flag_curator.dds"
					}
					background= {
						category = "backgrounds"
						file = "vertical.dds"
					}
					colors={
						"blue"
						"dark_blue"
						"null"
						"null"
					}
				}
				ethos = {
					ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					ethic = ethic_pacifist
				}
				ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_country_flag = curator_enclave_country
				set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Curator_Alpha_Enclave"
					settings = { spawn_debris = no }
					effect = {
						set_owner = prev
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "NAME_Curator_Enclave_Station"
							graphical_culture = prev
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							angle = random
							distance = 100
						}
						save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
						prev = {
							set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
						}
					}
				}
				create_leader = {
					type = ruler
					species = prev
					name = random
					skill = 2000
				}
				set_leader = last_created_leader
			}
		}


	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 7 max = 10 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 12
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 15
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6

		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		orbit_distance = 56

		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }

		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56

#Curators II
guardian_curators_init_2 = {
	class = sc_black_hole
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	spawn_chance = 100
	flags = { guardians_curators_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 19
		has_ring = no

		init_effect = {
			create_species = {
				name = random
				class = random
				portrait = random
				traits = random
				#homeworld = this
			}
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Curator_Sigma_Enclave"
				type = enclave
				authority = "auth_oligarchic"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_ancient_preservers
				}
				species = last_created
				flag = {
					icon = {
						category = "enclaves"
						file = "enclaves_flag_curator.dds"
					}
					background= {
						category = "backgrounds"
						file = "sinus.dds"
					}
					colors={
						"blue"
						"dark_blue"
						"null"
						"null"
					}
				}
				ethos = {
					ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					ethic = ethic_pacifist
				}
				ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_country_flag = curator_enclave_country
				set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Curator_Sigma_Enclave"
					settings = { spawn_debris = no }
					effect = {
						set_owner = prev
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "NAME_Curator_Enclave_Station"
							graphical_culture = prev
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 120
						}
						save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
						prev = {
							set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
						}	
					}
				}
				create_leader = {
					type = ruler
					species = last_created
					name = random
					skill = 2000
				}
				set_leader = last_created_leader
			}
		}


	}

}

#Curators III
guardian_curators_init_3 = {
	class = sc_neutron_star
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	scaled_spawn_chance = 16
	flags = { guardians_curators_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no

		init_effect = {
			create_species = {
				name = random
				class = random
				portrait = random
				traits = random
				#homeworld = this
			}
			create_country = {
				name = "NAME_Curator_Lambda_Enclave"
				type = enclave
				authority = "auth_oligarchic"
				civics = {
					civic = civic_ancient_preservers
				}
				species = last_created
				flag = {
					icon = {
						category = "enclaves"
						file = "enclaves_flag_curator.dds"
					}
					background= {
						category = "backgrounds"
						file = "triangle_split.dds"
					}
					colors={
						"blue"
						"dark_blue"
						"null"
						"null"
					}
				}
				ethos = {
					ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					ethic = ethic_pacifist
				}
				ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
			}
			last_created_country = {
				set_country_flag = curator_enclave_country
				set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Curator_Lambda_Enclave"
					settings = { spawn_debris = no }
					effect = {
						set_owner = prev
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "NAME_Curator_Enclave_Station"
							graphical_culture = prev
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 90
						}
						save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
						prev = {
							set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
						}
						set_fleet_flag = curator_enclave_station
					}
				}
				create_leader = {
					type = ruler
					species = last_created
					name = random
					skill = 2000
				}
				set_leader = last_created_leader
			}
		}


	}

	change_orbit = 60

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		entity = "barren_planet_01_destroyed_entity"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		entity = "barren_planet_01_destroyed_entity"
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

}

#Traders I
guardian_traders_init_1 = {
	class = sc_m
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	spawn_chance = 100
	flags = { guardians_traders_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Xuri"
					plural = Xuri
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_XuraCorp"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "00_solid.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_1
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_XuraCorp_HQ"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Xuri"
					plural = Xuri
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_XuraCorp"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "00_solid.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_1
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_XuraCorp_HQ"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Xuri"
					plural = Xuri
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_XuraCorp"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "00_solid.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_1
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_XuraCorp_HQ"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Xuri"
					plural = Xuri
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_XuraCorp"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "00_solid.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_fanatic_materialist
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_1
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_XuraCorp_HQ"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 15
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}

#Traders II
guardian_traders_init_2 = {
	class = sc_m
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	scaled_spawn_chance = 16
	flags = { guardians_traders_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan"
					plural = Riggans
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan_Commerce_Exchange"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "circle.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_materialist
						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_2
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Grand_Bazaar"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan"
					plural = Riggans
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan_Commerce_Exchange"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "circle.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_materialist
						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_2
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Grand_Bazaar"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan"
					plural = Riggans
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan_Commerce_Exchange"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "circle.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_materialist
						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_2
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Grand_Bazaar"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan"
					plural = Riggans
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Riggan_Commerce_Exchange"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "circle.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_materialist
						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_2
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Grand_Bazaar"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 15
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

}

#Traders III
guardian_traders_init_3 = {
	class = sc_m
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		modifier = {
			has_leviathans = yes
			add = 100
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			is_fe_cluster = yes
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}



	max_instances = 1
	scaled_spawn_chance = 12
	flags = { guardians_traders_system enclave }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Muutagan"
					plural = Muutagans
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Muutagan_Merchant_Guild"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "double_hemispheres.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_materialist
						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_3
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Muutag_Station"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}
							save_event_target_as = CustomCapital
							prev = {
								set_custom_capital_location = event_target:CustomCapital
							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
				init_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = event_target:GuardiansTradersPlanet
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = GuardiansTradersPlanet
				set_planet_flag = guardians_traders_planet
				create_species = {
					name = "NAME_Muutagan"
					plural = Muutagans
					class = random
					portrait = random
					traits = {
						trait = trait_thrifty
					}
					#homeworld = this
				}
				create_country = {
					name = "NAME_Muutagan_Merchant_Guild"
					type = enclave
					authority = "auth_oligarchic"
					civics = {
						civic = civic_trading_conglomerate
					}
					species = last_created
					flag = {
						icon = {
							category = "enclaves"
							file = "enclaves_flag_trader.dds"
						}
						background = {
							category = "backgrounds"
							file = "double_hemispheres.dds"
						}
						colors={
							"green"
							"dark_green"
							"null"
							"null"
						}
					}
					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile
						ethic = ethic_materialist
						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country_3
					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {
						name = "NAME_Muutag_Station"
						settings = { spawn_debris = no }
						effect = {
							set_owner = prev

								name = random
								design = "NAME_Trader_Enclave_Station"
								graphical_culture = prev
							}
							set_location = {
								target = prevprev
								distance = 90
							}

							prev = {

							}
							set_fleet_flag = trader_enclave_station
						}
					}
					create_leader = {
						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}


		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

		count = 1

							file = "double_hemispheres.dds"
						}

							"green"

					ethos = {
						ethic = ethic_xenophile

						ethic = ethic_egalitarian
					}
					ignore_initial_colony_error = yes
				}
				last_created_country = {
					set_country_flag = trader_enclave_country

					set_graphical_culture = mammalian_01
					create_fleet = {

							prev = {

							}

						type = ruler
						species = prev
						name = random
						skill = 2000
					}
					set_leader = last_created_leader
				}
			}
		}

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

		count = 1
